inclusion.criterion: systolic blood pressure ≥160mm of Hg or diastolic BP ≥110 mm Hg
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pacing device in place or any type of cardiac arrhythmia
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has carotid bruits, significant bilateral carotid stenosis, and patent right ACA and MCA. He also has a history of CAD s/p CABG, prior CVA, HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD.
